data.name: Oust
data.detailed_description:
Oust is an asymmetrical side scrolling platformer game that blends strategy, rpg, and pvp elements into a beautiful, easy-to-pick-up game. All players spawn into the beautiful, procedurally-generated world as peasants with the goal of taking the crown to become king for the longest amount of time. As a peasant, you are able customize your profession and fighting style, find equipment, and gather support to overthrow the king. As king, enlist guards and make decrees to remain in power. Play singleplayer in scenarios where you must take and hold the crown, or play against friends, locally or online, and keep the crown the longest.


All players begin the game as a peasant. As a peasant, you must take the crown by force. Levy the power of magical tribes, cast unique spells, start revolts, recruit mercenaries, purchase equipment, and explore ruins for rare items all to overthrow the crown.


When king, keep the crown at all costs from others trying to overthrow you. Enlist knights to keep order, massacre revolts, tax peasants, construct walls for defense, and make decrees to restrict the rights of peasants.


Do everything you can to survive in the unforgiving, procedurally generated world. Construct buildings, craft weapons, fend off animals and creatures of the night, and keep the darkness at bay.


Customize your occupation, fighting proficiency, and abilities so that you can take the crown in your unique playstyle.

Play life as a

  • Blacksmith: craft weaponry for an advantage in combat
  • Apothecary: heal and create plagues to manipulate the kingdom
  • Herald: use status to corrupt, steal from, and destabilize the kingdom
  • Druid: enchant spells and weaponry for control of the kingdom
  • Farmer: grow crops to become rich and gain favor of the kingdom
  • Priest: use increased favor for unmatched influence of the kingdom

Be proficient in

  • Hand-To-Hand Combat
  • Light Weaponry
  • Heavy Weaponry
  • Ranged Combat

data.short_description: Oust blends strategy, rpg, and pvp elements neatly into a beautiful, easy-to-pick-up game. Begin the game as a peasant, customize your profession and fighting style, find equipment and gather support to overthrow the king. As king, manage the kingdom to remain in power as long as you can.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel 4th Gen Dual Core 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX Series 8
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX
  • Processor: Intel 5th Gen
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
